mapper.sql: car_id, car_name, brand_id, brand_cat_id, brand_model_id, offical_price, quote_type, sale_price_type, sale_amount, shop_price, total_number, lock_number, surplus_number, province, city, area, has_parts , parts , parts_price, add_time, add_user_id, start_date, end_date, car_type, status, invoice_type, sort_order, remark, offical_price, refresh_time
mapper.insert:
insert into auto_car ( car_name, brand_id, brand_cat_id, brand_model_id, province, city, area, refresh_time, has_parts, parts, parts_price, add_time, add_user_id, start_date, end_date, car_type, status, invoice_type, remark, sort_order, refresh_time, offical_price ) values (
#{carName}, #{brandId}, #{brandCatId}, #{brandModelId}, #{refreshTime}, #{province}, #{city}, #{area}, #{hasParts}, #{parts}, #{partsPrice}, #{addTime}, #{addUserId}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{carType}, #{status}, #{invoiceType}, #{remark}, #{sortOrder}, #{refreshTime}, #{officalPrice} )
mapper.update:
update auto_car
car_name = #{carName},
brand_id = #{brandId},
brand_cat_id = #{brandCatId},
brand_model_id = #{brandModelId},
offical_price = #{officalPrice},
quote_type = #{quoteType},
sale_price_type = #{salePriceType},
sale_amount = #{saleAmount},
shop_price = #{shopPrice},
total_number = #{totalNumber},
lock_number = #{lockNumber},
surplus_number = #{surplusNumber},
province = #{province},
city = #{city},
area = #{area},
has_parts = #{hasParts},
parts = #{parts},
parts_price = #{partsPrice},
add_time = #{addTime},
add_user_id = #{addUserId},
start_date = #{startDate},
end_date = #{endDate},
car_type = #{carType},
status = #{status},
sort_order = #{sortOrder},
refresh_time = #{refreshTime},
offical_price = #{officalPrice},
remark = #{remark}
where car_id = #{carId}
mapper.select:
select ac.*, acp.path as pic
,IFNULL(select collect_id auto_user_collect as auc where auc.user_id = #{viewUserId}, 0) as collect_id
from auto_car as ac left join auto_car_pic as acp on acp.car_id = ac.car_id
ac.car_id = #{carId}
ac.car_id = (select car_id from auto_order_car where order_id = #{orderId})
limit 0, 1
